titleStmt.title: Now and ever; shewing, where the work of conversion is thoroughly done, it is done for ever. / By William Jemmat, preacher of the Gospel in Reading.
titleStmt.author: Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Miller for John Chandler, bookseller in Reading,

notesStmt.note: First two leaves contain titlepage (reverse blank) and preface to the reader, signed W.J.
Sermon based on Isaiah, chapter 40, verses 30-31.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
